content: अभिजित् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अभि-जि-क्विप्] {@--1@} Victorious, conquering completely. {@--2@} Helping in conquering completely. {@--3@} Born under the constellation अभिजित् <ls>P. IV. 3. 36</ls>, see अभिजित {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a sacrifice, part of the great sacrifice called गवामयन; <ls>Ms. 11. 75</ls>, also used for अतिरात्र <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of a star; <ab>N.</ab> of one of the lunar mansions. {%--<ab>n.</ab>%} {@--1@} The 8th Muhūrta of the day, midday (fit for a Śrāddha ceremony). {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a लग्न favourable to setting out.
